QuestData.Title: Chaos and Commotion
QuestData.Description:
$n! Did you hear the noise? There has been an incident on the bottom floor.
One of my trusted investigators, Erima, was there first. He will require assistance gathering evidence while he tries to interview the crowd.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Erima investigate the incident at the bottom floor of the Seat of the Aspects.
QuestData.RewardText:
I am grateful Captain Drine sent you to help.
You have keen eyes and are resourceful.
